module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Backup & Restore for your FreePBX environment
module.changelog: *15.0.8.69* FREEI-765 FREEI-826 FREEPBX-20646 Adding Warmspare functionality *15.0.8.68* FREEPBX-20645 Backup to AWS also keeping copies locally *15.0.8.67* FREEI-782 backup restore: no Apply Config button available *15.0.8.66* FREEI-817 Make warm spare functionality invisible in the UI *15.0.8.65* FREEI-819: when uploading a backup, create the uploads folder if it doesn't exist *15.0.8.64* FREEI-804 Backup: sometimes, uploading to restore fails with Whoops error about Max Execution time *15.0.8.63* bump *15.0.8.62* bump *15.0.8.61* Bugfix/FREEPBX-20401 backup always sends *15.0.8.60* Bugfix/FREEPBX-20414 restoring backup in php 7.0 results in strict standards error *15.0.8.59* FREEPBX-20480 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 13) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is not flushing the previously existing Conference data. *15.0.8.58* FREEPBX-20492 FREEPBX-20494 13 to 15 restore issue with firewall *15.0.8.57* FREEPBX-20405 failure to backup to location occurs silently in GUI - no email alert generated *15.0.8.56* bump *15.0.8.55* FREEPBX-20357 *15.0.8.54* FREEPBX-20382 FREEPBX-20383 FREEPBX-20398 *15.0.8.53* FREEPBX-20401 Add the content of backup.log, in body or attachment *15.0.8.52* FREEPBX-20358 Legacy restore adds slashes in front of caller-id name *15.0.8.51* FREEPBX-20451 restore log msg and restapp process order for legacy *15.0.8.50* bump *15.0.8.49* Fixes FREEPBX-20446: read public key instead of private *15.0.8.48* Fixes FREEPBX-20447: corrected id of span-element *15.0.8.47* FREEPBX-20397 removed stripslashes for data. *15.0.8.46* FREEPBX-20374 Restoring legacy(FreePBX 14) Backup into FreePBX 15 system is not restoring the Feature codes *15.0.8.45* FREEPBX-20121 Backup rotation faulty *15.0.8.44* FREEI-672 *15.0.8.43* FREEPBX-20411 Getting exception error while editing Qxact Reports Template *15.0.8.42* bump *15.0.8.41* FREEPBX-20403 FREEPBX-20401 *15.0.8.40* FREEPBX-20347 Legacy backup Restore common issue *15.0.8.39* FREEPBX-20370 restore issue with apache port *15.0.8.38* FREEPBX-20341 invalid argument passed in call flow control - daynight) *15.0.8.37* FREEPBX-20352 Legacy restore stops at restapps if the restore is done through GUI. *15.0.8.36* FREEPBX-20335 backup restore stops due to restapps and sysadmin port changes *15.0.8.35* FREEPBX-20324 Getting whoops error while updating sangoma CRM module to edge version in FreePBX 15 *15.0.8.34* FREEPBX-20293 Legacy 15 restore stops at queuestats import *15.0.8.33* FREEPBX-20073 Backup module not restored in the secondary system *15.0.8.32* FREEPBX-20121 Backup rotation faulty *15.0.8.31* FREEPBX-20060 Restore stops after restapps module *15.0.8.30* FREEPBX-20087 backup fails on queue stats *15.0.8.29* FREEPBX-20067 Fix parsing astdb data for restore. *15.0.8.28* FREEPBX-20089 dumpDBTables with table name with and without underscore *15.0.8.27* FREEPBX-20027 Getting exception error while downloading or deleting *15.0.8.26* FREEPBX-20067 *15.0.8.25* Bugfix/FREEPBX-20067 featurecodes not restored *15.0.8.24* FREEPBX-20082 Backup restore module is not restoring Broadcast module entries in secondary system. *15.0.8.23* FREEPBX-20027 Fix tmp path in console *15.0.8.22* FREEPBX-20041 *15.0.8.21* FREEPBX-20017 Can't install latest Backup & Restore module due to Cutom Cron entry *15.0.8.20* bump *15.0.8.19* Fixing Backup allows to create Empty and Duplicate entries. *15.0.8.18* Fixing FREEPBX-20028 Delete issue from edit section *15.0.8.17* FREEPBX-19984 only restore legacy pbx tables (for now) *15.0.8.16* FREEPBX-19890 Check for existence of a private key, not public *15.0.8.15* FREEPBX-19931 *15.0.8.14* FREEPBX-19921 *15.0.8.13* Catch errors during cleanup but dont abort *15.0.8.12* FREEPBX-19882 *15.0.8.11* FREEPBX-19679 *15.0.8.10* FREEPBX-19675 *15.0.8.9* Jump to restore if one is active *15.0.8.8* FREEPBX-19651 *15.0.8.7* Dont store metadata about backups *15.0.8.6* FREEPBX-19660 and network connectivity issues *15.0.8.4* FREEI-429 *15.0.8.3* FREEI-429 *15.0.8.2* Fix migrations *15.0.8.1* FREEPBX-19634 Unable to send backup email *15.0.8* Fix backup issues *15.0.7* Handle restores from 12 or lower (scary) *15.0.6* Rework functions from filestore *15.0.5.3* Remove duplicated log message *15.0.5.1* Allow framework to be backed up *15.0.5* implement default fallback for unimplemented modules using --fallback cli option *15.0.4.6* Bug fixes and speed enhancements *15.0.4.5* reference to object fix *15.0.4.4* reference to object fix *15.0.4.3* reference to object fix *15.0.4.2* Add back migration *15.0.4.1* Add Additional warning *15.0.3beta7* FREEPBX-18886 Fix long polling on backup log *15.0.3beta6* Set the debug flag to false which will clean up old data db data *15.0.3beta5* FREEPBX-18709 Fix corrupt backups, fix restore log *15.0.3beta4* FREEPBX-18155 Move echo to logger in legacy *15.0.3beta3* FREEPBX-18882 Update help text in fwconsole *15.0.3beta2* FREEPBX-18885 Fix cron syntax, don't hardcode sbin. *15.0.3beta1* Bump to beta *15.0.3alpha15* FREEPBX-18754 Updates for logger in framework 15.0.1.33 *15.0.3alpha14* FREEPBX-18625 Rework the message handling *15.0.3alpha14* FREEPBX-18166 *15.0.3alpha14* Fixing problems in Backup 15 *15.0.3alpha11* New Backup and Restore for 15.0 *15.0.3alpha10* FREEPBX-18160 More fixes to server migrations *15.0.3alpha9* FREEPBX-18252 Fix variables in
